description:
Full 1-bedroom apt available all to yourself! You’ll love my place because of the ambiance, the large modern space, windows with tons of natural lighting, the easy access to subway lines, steps away from central park + the met. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers! WIFI and full kitchen available for your use!

Full 1-bedroom apt available all to yourself! You’ll love my place because of the ambiance, the large modern space, windows with tons of natural lighting, the easy access to subway lines, steps away from central park + the met. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers! WIFI and full kitchen available for your use! Also extra space includes table for dining, a couch for resting and a desk should you have any work you need to do.

Full entirely private 1-bedroom apartment as your disposal!

I will be out of town while you are staying at my place but you can always get in touch with me via email if anything comes up. If it is very urgent, I have someone close you can call!

Cozy, lots of restaurants within blocks, easy access to anything from libraries, parks, bars!

Very close to 4,5,6 trains. Each of these hit all important stops within Manhattan. Very convenient.
name: Spacious Private One Bedroom Apt UPPER EAST GEM
